ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.2_0: a number of nuns were bathing naked at a ford in the river Aciravatī together with prostitutes.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.4_0: “Venerables, why practice the spiritual life when you’re still young? Why not enjoy worldly pleasures?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.5_0: When you’re old, then you can practice the spiritual life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.6_0: In this way you’ll obtain the benefits of both.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.8_0: they went to the nuns’ dwelling place and told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.9_0: The nuns then told the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.10_0: They in turn told the Buddha.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.11_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.12_0: “Well then, monks, I will lay down a training rule for the nuns for the following ten reasons:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.13_0: for the well-being of the Sangha ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.15_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.16.1_0: ‘If a nun bathes naked, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.6_0: if she bathes without wearing a sarong or an upper robe, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.7_0: When the bath is finished, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.2_0: if her robe has been stolen;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.6_0: The first training rule is finished.
